Package eu.h2020.helios_social.core.trustmanager

Class TrustManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.trustmanager.TrustManager
  • public class TrustManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class of the Trust Module. After being instantiated, it will automatically start computing trust values towards the nodes in the active contexts. This class contains all the parameters that are needed to compute the trust values, namely the weights of the module (that can be set to default or chosen as desired by passing them to the constructor) and the time interval that elapses between trust computations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrustManager

        public TrustManager​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.ContextualEgoNetwork c,
                    int deltaT,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Float> modelWeights)
        Constructor method. It creates an instance of Trust manager with chosen model parameter weights. The weights that are not specified are set to default.
        Parameters:
        c - A reference to the Contextual Ego Network module
        deltaT - The time that has to elapse between trust computations
        modelWeights - A map containing chosen values for the model parameter weights. To set the parameter weights, insert the following keys in the map:
        • ProfileSimilarityInit to set the initial weight for the profile similarity parameter. Since this parameter is optional, one can decide not to take it into account in the computation by assigning it a weight of 0.
        • CommonFriendsInit to set the initial weight for the common friends parameter
        • CommonFriends to set the weight for the common friends parameter
        • ProximityInit to set the initial weight for the proximity parameter
        • Proximity to set the weight for the proximity parameter
        • SentimentAnalysis to set the weight for the sentiment analysis parameter

    • Method Detail

      • startModule

        public void startModule()
        Starts the trust handling threads for the currently active contexts.

      • newContext

        public void newContext​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context c)
        Adds a new context to the Trust Manager. The just added context is supposed to be active when this method is called.
        Parameters:
        c - A reference to the newly created context

      • activateContext

        public void activateContext​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context c)
        This method has to be called when a context's status is switched to active. The related trust handling thread is notified, in order to re-start computing trust values towards the nodes within that context.
        Parameters:
        c - The context whose status has been switched to active

      • deactivateContext

        public void deactivateContext​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context c)
        This method has to be called when a context's status is switched to inactive. The related trust handling thread is notified, and put to a waiting status through a condition variable.
        Parameters:
        c - The context whose status has been switched to inactive

      • getTrust

        public float getTrust​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context c,
                      eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node alter)
        Gets the trust value related to an alter in a specific context. Trust isn't directly recomputed; the value that is returned is the one saved by the thread (that is the one that is present in the Contextual Ego Network) at a moment x that belongs to the interval (t - deltaT, t) (where t represents the current time)
        Parameters:
        c - The context within which the trust value towards the alter has to be computed
        alter - The alter towards which the trust value has to be computed
        Returns:
        The trust value computed at the moment x

      • addAlterToContext

        public void addAlterToContext​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node alter,
                              eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context c)
        This method has to be called when an alter is added to a context. The thread related to that context will compute an initial trust value towards the alter.
        Parameters:
        alter - The alter that has been newly added to the context
        c - The context in which the alter has been added

      • removeContext

        public void removeContext​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context c)
        This method has to be called when a context is removed from the Contextual Ego Network. The thread related to that context is shut down by the Trust Manager.
        Parameters:
        c - The context that has been removed from the Contextual Ego Network
